member.summary: Gets the paging information.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Core.PagingInfo
member.summary: Represents paging information

member.summary: Gets or sets the page size for the request.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Core.PagingInfo.TotalCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of items

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Core.PagingInfo.TotalPages
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages based on the page size and total number.

member.name: M:MtgApiManager.Lib.Core.PagingInfo.Create(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new page info class.
member.param: The page size for the request.
member.returns: A new instance of a paging info.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard
member.summary: Object representing a MTG card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Artist
member.summary: Gets the artist of the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Border
member.summary: Gets the border of the card. If the border for this specific card is DIFFERENT than the border specified in the top level set JSON, then it will be specified here. (Example: Unglued has silver borders, except for the lands which are black bordered)

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Cmc
member.summary: Gets the converted Mana cost.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.ColorIdentity
member.summary: Gets the card colors by color code. [“Red”, “Blue”] becomes [“R”, “U”]

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Colors
member.summary: Gets the card colors. Usually this is derived from the casting cost, but some cards are special (like the back of dual sided cards and Ghostfire).

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Flavor
member.summary: Gets the flavor text of the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.ForeignNames
member.summary: Gets the foreign language names for the card, if this card in this set was printed in another language. Not available for all sets.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Hand
member.summary: Gets the maximum hand size modifier. Only exists for Vanguard cards.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Id
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets the image URL for a card. Only exists if the card has a multiverse id.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.IsMultiColor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the card has more than a single color.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.IsColorless
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the card has no colors and is colorless.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Layout
member.summary: Gets the card layout. Possible values: normal, split, flip, double-faced, token, plane, scheme, phenomenon, leveler, vanguard

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Legalities
member.summary: Gets which formats this card is legal, restricted or banned

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Life
member.summary: Gets the starting life total modifier. Only exists for Vanguard cards.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Loyalty
member.summary: Gets the loyalty of the card. This is only present for planeswalkers.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.ManaCost
member.summary: Gets the mana cost of this card. Consists of one or more Mana symbols.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.MultiverseId
member.summary: Gets the multiverse identifier of the card on Wizard’s Gatherer web page. Cards from sets that do not exist on Gatherer will NOT have a multiverse identifier. Sets not on Gatherer are: ATH, ITP, DKM, RQS, DPA and all sets with a 4 letter code that starts with a lowercase 'p’.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Name
member.summary: Gets the card name. For split, double-faced and flip cards, just the name of one side of the card. Basically each ‘sub-card’ has its own record.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Names
member.summary: Gets the names of the card. Only used for split, flip and dual cards. Will contain all the names on this card, front or back.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Number
member.summary: Gets the card number. This is printed at the bottom-center of the card in small text..

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.OriginalText
member.summary: Gets the original text on the card at the time it was printed. This field is not available for promo cards.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.OriginalType
member.summary: Gets the original type on the card at the time it was printed. This field is not available for promo cards.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Power
member.summary: Gets the power of the card. This is only present for creatures.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Printings
member.summary: Gets the sets that this card was printed in, expressed as an array of set codes.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Rarity
member.summary: Gets the rarity of the card. Examples: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Mythic Rare, Special, Basic Land

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.ReleaseDate
member.summary: Gets the date this card was released. This is only set for promo cards. The date may not be accurate to an exact day and month, thus only a partial date may be set (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM or YYYY). Some promo cards do not have a known release date.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Reserved
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this card is reserved by Wizards Official Reprint Policy.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Rulings
member.summary: Gets the rulings for the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Set
member.summary: Gets the set the card belongs to (set code).

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.SetName
member.summary: Gets the set the card belongs to.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Source
member.summary: Gets where this card was originally obtained for promo cards. For box sets that are theme decks, this is which theme deck the card is from.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Starter
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this card was only released as part of a core box set. These are technically part of the core sets and are tournament legal despite not being available in boosters.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.SubTypes
member.summary: Gets the he subtypes of the card. These appear to the right of the dash in a card type. Usually each word is its own subtype. Example values: Trap, Arcane, Equipment, Aura, Human, Rat, Squirrel, etc.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.SuperTypes
member.summary: Gets the super types of the card. These appear to the far left of the card type. Example values: Basic, Legendary, Snow, World, Ongoing

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Text
member.summary: Gets the oracle text of the card. May contain mana symbols and other symbols.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Timeshifted
member.summary: Gets the a value indicating whether this card was a time shifted card in the set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Toughness
member.summary: Gets the toughness of the card. This is only present for creatures.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Type
member.summary: Gets the card type. This is the type you would see on the card if printed today. Note: The dash is a UTF8 'long dash’ as per the MTG rules

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Types
member.summary: Gets the types of the card. These appear to the left of the dash in a card type. Example values: Instant, Sorcery, Artifact, Creature, Enchantment, Land, Planeswalker

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Variations
member.summary: Gets if a card has alternate art (for example, 4 different Forests, or the 2 Brothers Yamazaki) then each other variation’s multiverseid will be listed here, NOT including the current card’s multiverseid.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ICard.Watermark
member.summary: Gets the watermark on the card. Note: Split cards don’t currently have this field set, despite having a watermark on each side of the split card.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IForeignName
member.summary: Object representing a foreign name for an MTG card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IForeignName.Language
member.summary: Gets the language it was printed in.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IForeignName.MultiverseId
member.summary: Gets the multiverse identifier of the card for the foreign name.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IForeignName.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the card in the foreign language.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ILegality
member.summary: Object representing the legality of a card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ILegality.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the legality.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ILegality.LegalityName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the legality.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IRuling
member.summary: Object representing a ruling for a card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IRuling.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of the ruling.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.IRuling.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the ruling.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.Legality
member.summary: Object representing the legality of a card.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.Ruling
member.summary: Object representing a ruling for a card.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet
member.summary: Object representing a MTG Set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Block
member.summary: Gets the block the set is in.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Booster
member.summary: Gets the booster contents for this set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Border
member.summary: Gets the type of border on the cards, either “white”, “black” or “silver”.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Code
member.summary: Gets the code name of the set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Expansion
member.summary: Gets the type of set. One of: “core”, “expansion”, “reprint”, “box”, “un”, “from the vault”, “premium deck”, “duel deck”, “starter”, “commander”, “planechase”, “archenemy”, “promo”, “vanguard”, “masters”.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.GathererCode
member.summary: Gets the code that Gatherer uses for the set. Only present if different than .

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.MagicCardsInfoCode
member.summary: Gets the code that magiccards.info uses for the set. Only present if magiccards.info has this set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the set.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.OldCode
member.summary: Gets an old style code used by some Magic software. Only present if different than and .

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.OnlineOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the set was only released on line.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.ReleaseDate
member.summary: Gets when the set was released. For promo sets, the date the first card was released.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.ISet.Type
member.summary: Gets the set type.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Model.Set
member.summary: Object representing a MTG Set.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Properties.Resources.MtgError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to MTG Api Error.

member.name: T:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter
member.summary: Query parameters for the object.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Artist
member.summary: Gets or sets the artist of the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Cmc
member.summary: Gets or sets the converted Mana cost.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.ColorIdentity
member.summary: Gets or sets the card colors by color code. [“Red”, “Blue”] becomes [“R”, “U”].

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Colors
member.summary: Gets or sets the card colors. Usually this is derived from the casting cost, but some cards are special (like the back of dual sided cards and Ghostfire).

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Flavor
member.summary: Gets or sets the flavor text of the card.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.ForeignName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a card in a foreign language it was printed in.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.GameFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the game format, such as Commander, Standard, Legacy, etc. (when used, legality defaults to Legal unless supplied).

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language the card is printed in. Use this parameter when searching by foreignName.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Layout
member.summary: Gets or sets the card layout. Possible values: normal, split, flip, double-faced, token, plane, scheme, phenomenon, leveler, vanguard

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Legality
member.summary: Gets or sets the legality of the card for a given format, such as Legal, Banned or Restricted.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Loyalty
member.summary: Gets or sets the loyalty of the card. This is only present for planeswalkers.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the card name. For split, double-faced and flip cards, just the name of one side of the card. Basically each ‘sub-card’ has its own record.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Number
member.summary: Gets or sets the card number. This is printed at the bottom-center of the card in small text..

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.OrderBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the field to order by in the response results.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the page number.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Power
member.summary: Gets or sets the power of the card. This is only present for creatures.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Rarity
member.summary: Gets or sets the rarity of the card. Examples: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Mythic Rare, Special, Basic Land

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Set
member.summary: Gets or sets the set the card belongs to (set code).

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.SetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the set the card belongs to.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.SubTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the he subtypes of the card. These appear to the right of the dash in a card type. Usually each word is its own subtype. Example values: Trap, Arcane, Equipment, Aura, Human, Rat, Squirrel, etc.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.SuperTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the super types of the card. These appear to the far left of the card type. Example values: Basic, Legendary, Snow, World, Ongoing

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the oracle text of the card. May contain mana symbols and other symbols.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Toughness
member.summary: Gets or sets the toughness of the card. This is only present for creatures.

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the card type. This is the type you would see on the card if printed today. Note: The dash is a UTF8 'long dash’ as per the MTG rules

member.name: P:MtgApiManager.Lib.Service.CardQueryParameter.Types
member.summary: Gets or sets the types of the card. These appear to the left of the dash in a card type. Example values: Instant, Sorcery, Artifact, Creature, Enchantment, Land, Planeswalker
